ARUGAL.swapForFees() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fd09fe27aa950d88ab9e6e6f3da328d81aebb020_ARUGAL.sol#492-524) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- unitBalance = deltaBalance / (denominator - sellTaxes.liquidity) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fd09fe27aa950d88ab9e6e6f3da328d81aebb020_ARUGAL.sol#506)
